briefTitle: Evaluation of Brimonidine Tartrate/Ketotifen Fumarate Combination for the Treatment of Allergic Conjunctivitis

outcomeMeasures.title: Ocular Itching
outcomeMeasures.description: Ocular itching score (measured on a 0-4 unit scale, allowing half-unit increments; average score of the subject's two eyes) assessed by the subjects at 3 (±1), 5 (±1), and 7 (±1) minutes post-CAC.

outcomeMeasures.title: Conjunctival Redness
outcomeMeasures.description: Conjunctival redness score (measured on a 0-4unit scale, allowing half-unit increments; average score of the subject's two eyes) assessed by investigator at 7 (±1), 15 (±1), and 20 (±1) minutes post-CAC.
